alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:47AM CDT until May 09 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Central Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Grainger County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Union County in east Tennessee... North central Sevier County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 630 AM EDT. * At 546 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plainview, or 7 miles south of Maynardville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Sevierville, Jefferson City, Dandridge, Maynardville, Rutledge, White Pine, Plainview, New Market and Strawberry Plains. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 402 and 421. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier; Union
